name: Git Commit Template
description:
Create a commit message with the following template:

        <type>(<scope>): <subject>
        <BLANK LINE>
        <body>
        <BLANK LINE>
        <footer>
notes:
### Features

* suggest previously used scopes ([4c4f3e2](https://github.com/MobileTribe/commit-template-idea-plugin/commit/4c4f3e2)), closes [#7](https://github.com/MobileTribe/commit-template-idea-plugin/issues/7)
* wrap commit message to 72 characters ([ea10dd8](https://github.com/MobileTribe/commit-template-idea-plugin/commit/ea10dd8))
